solution_line_template: After she removed {removed_strawberries_per_bucket} strawberries there were {strawberries_per_bucket_initial}-{removed_strawberries_per_bucket}=<<{strawberries_per_bucket_initial}-{removed_strawberries_per_bucket}={strawberries_per_bucket_final}>>{strawberries_per_bucket_final} strawberries in each bucket.
